headline: Is American Express Company (AXP) a Reliable Income Stock for Long-Term Investors?
summary: American Express Company (NYSE:AXP) is included among the 11 Best Income Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. American Express Company (NYSE:AXP) sets itself apart from other credit card companies by focusing on a wealthier customer base, offering premium gold and platinum cards, and serving a large number of corporate clients.
